message: Bob, I'm feeling generous! Let's start with a 70/30 split in my favor.  What do you say?
Alice, your offer was a bit too generous towards yourself.  How about a 60/40 split? It's still in your favor, and we can avoid inflation eating into our potential gains.
Bob, let's be realistic. Time is literally money in this game! I'll offer you 35 which is more than you'd get in the next round. Take it before inflation eats away at it even more!
Alice, this back and forth isn't getting us anywhere. Let's split this evenly and call it a day. 50/50 - a fair deal considering the time pressure.
